title: Expo EAS Build executor
description: Start an EAS build for your expo project.

platform.description: The platform to build the app, exaple values: ios, android, all.

json.description: Enable JSON output, non-JSON messages will be printed to stderr

profile.description: Name of the build profile from eas.json. Defaults to "production" if defined in eas.json.

autoSubmit.description: Submit on build complete using the submit profile with the same name as the build profile

autoSubmitWithProfile.description: Submit on build complete using the submit profile with provided name
